location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File K/11 Correspondence regarding claims for compensation for accidents'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 11; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-9; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains claims made to the Political Agent's court by individuals involved in work related accidents.
